markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Jekkajak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2170)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 29

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Jekkajak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2170)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 62</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[_greater hat of disguise_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=442), _[heartripper blade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1730)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_heartripper blade_ +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4 piercing

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 21, attack +13
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) (4 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells 1 Focus Point,** DC 21
- **1st**
[Diabolic Edict](/Spells.aspx?ID=498)

**Smoky Retreat** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Requirements** Jekkajak is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** Jekkajak squeals in fright as she exhales a noxious cloud of stinking smoke. This smoke fills a 10-foot emanation around her and grants [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to all creatures within the smoke. In addition, any non-[kobold](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=65) starting their turn in the smoke must succeed at a DC 21 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) by the foul smoke (or sickened 2 on a critical failure). Once created, the cloud of smoke is immobile and persists for 3 rounds. Jekkajak can move up to her Speed, but she must end her movement in a space that isn't adjacent to any enemies. This is a 2nd-level spell that requires a somatic component.

</column>
name: Jekkajak
